pages.text: The noble warriors known as $(thing)Valkyrie$() reside in the $(thing)Silver Dungeons$() of the $(thing)Aether$(). They are a secretive group, only revealing their presence to those who step on their $(item)Angelic Stones$(). Even then, they will not attack unless you challenge them first. Upon defeat, they will yield, retreating into the shadows after giving you their $(item)Victory Medal$().
